tasks.label: build-and-test
tasks.command: cargo run -p xtask -- verify-candle --fft && cargo run -p xtask -- ci

tasks.label: Fast Search (ripgrep)
args: pattern=${input:searchPattern}; if [ -z "$pattern" ]; then echo "No pattern provided"; exit 1; fi; if ! command -v rg >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "ripgrep not installed"; exit 1; fi; cd /home/rustuser/projects/rust/active/dlinossrustcandle; rg -n --hidden -S -g "!target" -g "!.git" -g "!**/*.ipynb" "$pattern" | sed -n '1,200p'
